#

""" in F(n), for each 1 <= i <= n, it is in 2^(n-1) subsets.
so the sum is 2^(n-1) * n*(n+1)/2

s(n) = sum_n 2^(n-1) * n*(n+1)/2 = 2^(m -1)*m^2 - 2^(m-1)*m + 2^m -1

"""
m = 8388608
T = int( raw_input() )

f = {}
for i in xrange(1,23):
    f[i] = ( 2**(i-1) * i**2 - 2**(i-1) * i + 2**(i) - 1 ) % m

for t in xrange(T):
    x = int( raw_input() )
    print f[ min(22, x) ]
